Articles.Content:
All of the other big companies are focusing so much about getting Kerbals and Science at various planets, but what about the guys supporting them?

The Kerbs and Kerbettes working day in and day out to make sure our intrepid heroes can make those scientific low gravity leaps!

Meet our resource transport team:

Meet the lineup!

Currently three trailer variants for several different purposes.

We currently have one tanker variant, capable of transporting 3240 units of liquid fuel, and 3960 units of liquid oxidizer. I don't know if that's a lot, I just think the eggheads like to do math around here. Keeps them entertained.

Included in the pack is a flatbed variant as well. Tie down spots are available in multiple places down the sides. Featuring a motorized ramp in the rear, loading is easier than ever!

Don't worry though. We also have something for the family. Enjoy your next birthday in style with the Mobile Deployed Party Room, capable of housing 18 guests. Included are two satellite dishes, and two parabolic dishes, ensuring that your next Superbowl party has all of the right channels.

Download Here!

Unfortunately, our engineers decided to field test our Mobile Deployed Party Room, and now are hungover and can't work. So Please, send us your ideas for more add-ons to your convoy!

Note: Required mods are Mechjeb, Kerbal Attachment System, and Infernal Robotics.

Wow, there's a fair bit of work that went into these rigs, well done!

Cupcake...
Could you make a stock flatbed? It'd make a great race car transporter!

Wow, there's a fair bit of work that went into these rigs, well done!

Cupcake...

Thanks for the compliments. I do plan on adding many more.

Could you make a stock flatbed? It'd make a great race car transporter!

Well, if I make it for stock, it's very difficult to make anything stay on the trailer, since craft-craft physics are strange.
